name: Sacrificial Greatsword
title: Composed: Sacrificial Greatsword
desc: This greatsword has seen the passage of many years, and was once owned by a clan of brave and gifted warriors who fought hard and died young.
in_play_description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
